parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The separation of the windshield from its seal can cause the windshield to fall out, obstructing the driver's view and potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: The windshield starts to separate from the seal at the top
the windshield tips out at the top corner
the passenger side exterior rubber gasket is not staying attached to the fiberglass body of the motorhome.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering pump can cause a loss of power steering assist, making it difficult to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: vehicle pulls to one side (right or left).

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Carbon Monoxide Poisoning from Onan Generator
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Onan generator to properly vent carbon monoxide can lead to deadly poisoning, resulting in serious injury or death, especially when occupants are sleeping in the motorhome.
symptoms: as carbon monoxide is odorless and colorless
making it difficult to detect without proper warning systems.
